title: National Pawnbrokers Association Announces 2015 Board of Directors and Executive Officers Results
text:
It’s critical that the industry remains strong and united moving into the future. Keller, TX
The National Pawnbrokers Association made public the results of its recent election to select a new Board of Directors and Executive Officers. The association is pleased to announce that Larry Nuckols, of Brittex Financial in San Antonio, TX, will fill the role of NPA president in the upcoming term. Mr. Nuckols is a co-owner of Brittex Financial and formed Money Mart Pawn & Jewelry in 1993. He has served on the boards of various Texas pawn associations for 25 years and has served on the NPA Government Relations Committee. He and his wife of 40 years, Beverly, have two children and one wonderful grand-daughter, Veronica.“It’s an incredible privilege to lead the NPA in the next term,” said Mr. Nuckols. “It’s critical that the industry remains strong and united moving into the future.”

The elections results were announced at Pawn Expo 2015, the only national convention and trade show for the pawn industry, which was held at the Mirage Event Center and Resort in Las Vegas, NV.
For more information about the NPA, visit NationalPawnbrokers.org .
The NPA works to provide independent pawnbrokers nationwide with resources and tools to strengthen the pawn industry. NPA members are committed to operating their businesses in such a manner as to enhance and promote the positive and professional image of all pawnbrokers. Members believe in establishing positive and long-lasting relationships with local, state, and federal government officials. The NPA is the industry’s only national association and is located in Keller, TX.
